words.def: leniency and compassion shown toward offenders by a person or agency charged with administering justice
more or less flat-topped cluster of flowers in which the central or terminal flower opens first
the seed of the cereal grass
a recurring sleep state during which dreaming occurs
a quad with a square body
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
